title: When do we get a fix for Android 12 ???
content:
I've a pixel 4 and did the huge mistake to download Android 12. Now my phone is unusable. How long will it take to fix this. 
If it takes until August I'll have to switch to another device.. kinda mad.. was expecting couple bugs. But this is ridiculous.. all apps are crashing after 2sec. 
Only chrome web is working somewhat... 
Mails.. can't access
Instagram can't access
Reddit can't access... 
I'm a Social media manager.. my life is over
